Skill Notes:
Alchemical Crafting: Knows the formulas for at least 4 common 1st-level alchemical items
Intelligence Language Bonus: +1 Language Count
Rogue Skills: Skill Trained (Stealth; Choose 8 from any)
Ruffian: Skill Trained (Intimidation)
Skill Increases: Skill Increase (Choose 2 from any)
Alchemical Crafting: Can use Crafting to create alchemical items
Communal Crafting: Can reduce the cost of crafting items by giving or receiving assistance
Craft Anything: Can craft items without meeting secondary requirements
Crafter's Appraisal: Can use Crafting to Identify Magic on items
Formula Book: Has a book that contains at least 4 alchemical formulas
Impeccable Crafting: Successes on Specialty Crafting are critical successes
Improvise Tool: Can craft basic tools and repair them without a toolkit
Inventor: Can use Crafting to create unknown common formulas
Magical Crafting: Can Craft magic items and knows the formulas for 4 common magic items of 2nd level or lower
Quick Repair: Can Repair an item in 1 min
Rapid Affixture: Can Affix a Talisman in 1 min
Signature Crafting: Successful DC 9 flat check after Crafting a permanent magic item gives it a random quirk, or a selected quirk on a critical success
Snare Crafting: Can use Crafting to create snares and knows the formulas for 4 common snares
Specialty Crafting: +1 Crafting on a selected type of item
Steady Balance: Balance successes are critical successes/Balance does not inflict off-balance/Can use Acrobatics to Grab An Edge
Combat
Hit Points: 35 Armor Class: 18 (dexterity; trained) Class DC: Rogue: 18 (dexterity; trained)
Armor: None Shield: Tower (+2 AC when raised; hardness 5; HP 20) Weapons: Falchion (+6 1d10+1 S; strength; trained); Glaive (+6 1d8+1 S [Crit +d8]; strength; trained); Shield Boss (+6 1d6+1 B; strength; trained)
Combat Notes:
Constitution Hit Points Adjustment: +3
Dexterity Armor Class Adjustment: +3
Dexterity Attack Adjustment: +3
Ruffian: Defense Trained (Medium Armor)
Strength Attack Adjustment: +1
Unconventional Weaponry (Dwarven Waraxe): Weapon Familiarity (Dwarven Waraxe)
Deny Advantage: Does not suffer off-guard vs. hidden, undetected, flanking, or surprising foes of up to level 3
Mobility: Can Stride at half Speed without triggering reactions
Ruffian: Can sneak attack using any weapon other than simple or martial weapons that deal greater than d8 or d6 damage, and critical hits with one of these weapons on an off-guard foe inflict its critical specialization effect
Sneak Attack: Successful strike using an agile, finesse, or projectile weapon vs. a off-guard foe inflicts +1d6 HP precision damage
Surprise Attack: Rolling Deception or Stealth for initiative inflicts off-guard vs. self on creatures that haven't acted
Underhanded Assault: (2) Makes a melee Strike after a successful -2 Stealth vs. a foe that is adjacent to an ally
Save: Fortitude: +6 (constitution; trained); Reflex: +10 (dexterity; expert); Will: +8 (wisdom; expert)
Notes
Validation Errors:
Craft Anything Feat: Requires level (currently 3) >= 15 and crafting rank (currently 2) >= 4
General And Skill Feat Allocation: 5 available vs. 13 allocated
Impeccable Crafting Feat: Requires level (currently 3) >= 7, crafting rank (currently 2) >= 3 and specialty crafting feature (currently 1)
Rapid Affixture Feat: Requires level (currently 3) >= 7 and crafting rank (currently 2) >= 3
Signature Crafting Feat: Requires level (currently 3) >= 7, crafting rank (currently 2) >= 3 and magical crafting feature (currently 1)
